verbs.description: Arms experts [V: have] called the appointment of John Bolton as President Donald Trump 's newest advisor a " national security emergency " due his propensity for war .

[ARG0: Arms experts] have [V: called] [ARG1: the appointment of John Bolton as President Donald Trump 's newest advisor] [ARG2: a " national security emergency "] [ARGM-CAU: due his propensity for war] .
